intent.user_query: Show product sales performance by state.

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT c.State, p.ProductName, SUM(sd.Quantity * sd.UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID JOIN fitness_db.SaleDetails sd ON s.SaleID = sd.SaleDetailID JOIN fitness_db.Products p ON sd.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY c.State, p.ProductName ORDER BY c.State, TotalRevenue DESC;

arguments.sql: SELECT c.State, p.ProductName, SUM(sd.Quantity * sd.UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID JOIN fitness_db.SaleDetails sd ON s.SaleID = sd.SaleDetailID JOIN fitness_db.Products p ON sd.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY c.State, p.ProductName ORDER BY c.State, TotalRevenue DESC;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
